item.title: Cognitive development
item.description: Introductions Jean Piaget Sensorimotor stage There is a nice debate to what extent this is a human thing to have? Do animals possess object permanence understanding? There is a video of people hiding behind blankets, which shows the confusion of dogs to dissapearing humans. There is also a video of cats getting scared of their environment changing without their knowledge Pre operational stage Stage of concrete operations Stage of formal operations Lev Vygotsky Zone of proximal development Social and economic aspects of cognitive development

item.title: Attachment
item.description: Theories of Attachment Cognitive-behavioural Evolutionary Cognitive behavioural Dollard & Millerâ€™s theory is basically combination of classical and operational conditioning. Bowlby Bowlby’s evolutionary theory Mary Ainsworth Stranger situation Long term impacts of attachments
